#Solution to Exercise 1
```{r}
a <- 1:5 ; b <- 1:5
first <- cbind(a,b)
first
a <- 1:5 ; b <- c('1', '2', '3', '4', '5')
second <- cbind(a,b)
second
a <- 1:5 ; b <- 1:4; c <- 1:3
third <- cbind(a, b, c)
third
```
#Solution to Exercise 2
```{r}
a <- 1:5 ; b <- 1:5
first <- rbind(a,b)
first
a <- 1:5 ; b <- c('1', '2', '3', '4', '5')
second <- rbind(a,b)
second
a <- 1:5 ; b <- 1:4; c <- 1:3
third <- rbind(a,b,c)
third
```
